Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Model.Obstacle

Class ObstacleTest

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Model.Obstacle.ObstacleTest
class ObstacleTest
extends java.lang.Object
This class tests how the damageObstacle() method of Obstacle interacts with specific obstacles in specific situations.
Author:
Halil Doruk Yıldırım

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void damageAfterInfiniteVoidObstacle()
    REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES firmObs EFFECTS hits firm obstacle when infinite void is deactivated and damages it.
    (package private) void damageDuringInfiniteVoidObstacle()
    REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES none EFFECTS attempts to damage firm obstacle but fails due to infinite void spell
    (package private) void damageFirmObstacle()
    REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES firmObs EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle, lowering health by one
    (package private) void damageOneHPObstacle()
    REQUIRES simpleObs!=null MODIFIES simpleObs EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle, lowering health to zero
    (package private) void destroyedObstacleSubscriber()
    REQUIRES simpleObs!=null MODIFIES simpleObs, subscriber EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle and updates the subscriber's isDestroyed value.
    (package private) void initEach()

      @BeforeEach void initEach()

    • damageOneHPObstacle

      @Test @DisplayName("Checks if simple obstacles are removed from game after damaged.") void damageOneHPObstacle()
      REQUIRES simpleObs!=null MODIFIES simpleObs EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle, lowering health to zero

    • destroyedObstacleSubscriber

      @Test @DisplayName("Checks if subscriber is appropriately updated when obstacles are destroyed.") void destroyedObstacleSubscriber()
      REQUIRES simpleObs!=null MODIFIES simpleObs, subscriber EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle and updates the subscriber's isDestroyed value.

    • damageFirmObstacle

      @Test @DisplayName("Checks if firm obstacles are not destroyed by getting hit once but damaged.") void damageFirmObstacle()
      REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES firmObs EFFECTS damages the simple obstacle, lowering health by one

    • damageDuringInfiniteVoidObstacle

      @Test @DisplayName("Checks if infinite void appropriately prevents obstacles from taking damage.") void damageDuringInfiniteVoidObstacle()
      REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES none EFFECTS attempts to damage firm obstacle but fails due to infinite void spell

    • damageAfterInfiniteVoidObstacle

      @Test @DisplayName("Checks if obstacles are appropriately damaged after infinite void gets deactivated.") void damageAfterInfiniteVoidObstacle()
      REQUIRES firmObs!=null MODIFIES firmObs EFFECTS hits firm obstacle when infinite void is deactivated and damages it.
